title: Comparing online newspaper and social media

content.prompt: Both online newspapers and social media sites are used to distribute information on the Internet. Which of the following best describes an advantage that online newspapers have over social media sites?

choices.label: The ability to provide credibility to the information distributed
The ability to provide information that is widely accessible
The ability to provide media-rich content for low cost

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Describe the impact of a computing innovation.
